column1: The Church of the Southern Cross emerged after a prophet somewhere in the australian interior was given a new bible by Our Saviour
column2: the Gospel. After that the church grew in numbers and spread like wildfire
column3: both through missionary work and war. \n The head of the church is the archbishop
column4: who lives and rules Brisbane. However he is elected by a council of bishops. \n Though some claim the church is not christian due to their refusal of the trinity (instead choosing to replace it with a system of four different forms of God)
column5: the majority still says they are christians.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: johanite_DESC;This movement claims to be based on the ideas of John I
column3: who famously opposed archbishop Holy Warrior I during the Sydney Accusations. Though in reality these two movements don’t share much beyond an opposition to the archbishop. ;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: gnostic_DESC;The ideas proposed by Marcion of Sinope are almost as old as Christianity itself
column2: but the Church in its modern form was founded rather recently. It traces its origin to a dispute between the Elizabethan clergy and the mainstream Southcrosser opinion on the validity of the historical New Testament
column3: eventually culminating in a schism between the Principality of Elizabeth and the rest of the Southcrosser church and the total rejection of the Southcrosser Gospel. It rejects the god of the Old Testament
column4: claiming that the teachings of Jesus are incompatible with the genocidal maniac featured in the Old Testament. In game
column5: they are unable to declare Holy Wars and have decreased martial stats to represent their pacifism and loving nature.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: true_church_DESC;True Church - After the event and the rise of the Church of the Southern Cross
column2: the few australian christians who refused to switch their allegiance to the new church banded together and reorganized in the west
column3: where the new faith was the weakest
column4: forming the 'True and Christian Church of God and Jesus Christ'
column5: commonly known as the True Church. The religion blends aspects of several pre-existing denominations.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: aotearoan_DESC;After the chaos that consumed the islands after the event
column2: the former Maori Church became the only christian group in the region
column3: as every other denomination was replaced by Eruism. Though still christian
column4: the aotearoan church has adopted some elements from Eruism.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: purist_DESC;After the Aotearoan Church became widespread and started accepting anglos and other peoples into the fold
column2: a group of priests and theologians founded the Purist Movement
column3: which sought to bring the church back to what they saw as ‘the rightful path’
column4: in which the maori are the chosen people and foreigners are not allowed.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: indian_DESC;Indian church is christian denomination which have evolved from baptist and presbyterian churches in northeastern India.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
Though the origins of Eruism are shrouded in mystery and legend
column2: with some claiming it was founded by a prophet known only as ‘Tolkien’
column3: it is known that this monotheistic religion only became widespread after the XXII century. Followers believe in Eru Ilúvatar
column4: the only god and the creator of all life
column5: though they also believe in countless other beings
column7: and in the prophecy of the Chosen One.
